thread.section_title: ao.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.ao.com
thread.title: Heather S.

author: Heather S.
title: Heather S.
text:
My recent dealings with ao.com have exceeded my expectations. I bought four new items and was pleased with the multiple discounts I received. AO also price matched my induction hob. Every staff member I dealt with was professional and couldn't be more helpful.
My fridge arrived damaged but still happy to give 5 stars as the replacement was received early the next day and unpacked and put in it's place by two very helpful delivery men.
An excellent company to do business with.
